mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_ID, LEDGER_ID, NAME, IS_SYSTEM_CATEGORY, PARENT_ID, SORT_ORDER, IS_DELETED FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{id} AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, LEDGER_ID, NAME, IS_SYSTEM_CATEGORY, PARENT_ID, SORT_ORDER, IS_DELETED FROM CATEGORY WHERE LEDGER_ID = #{ledgerId} AND NAME = #{name} AND IS_DELETED = 'N' AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, LEDGER_ID, NAME, IS_SYSTEM_CATEGORY, PARENT_ID, SORT_ORDER, IS_DELETED FROM CATEGORY WHERE LEDGER_ID = #{ledgerId} AND IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ASC, NAME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY ( CATEGORY_ID, LEDGER_ID, NAME, IS_SYSTEM_CATEGORY, PARENT_ID, SORT_ORDER, IS_DELETED ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{ledgerId}, #{name}, NVL(#{isSystemCategory}, 'N'), #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NVL(#{sortOrder}, 0), NVL(#{isDeleted}, 'N') )
mapper.update: UPDATE CATEGORY SET LEDGER_ID = #{ledgerId}, NAME = #{name}, IS_SYSTEM_CATEGORY = NVL(#{isSystemCategory}, 'N'), PARENT_ID = #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_ORDER = NVL(#{sortOrder}, 0), IS_DELETED = NVL(#{isDeleted}, 'N') WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
UPDATE CATEGORY SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{id}
UPDATE CATEGORY SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE LEDGER_ID = #{ledgerId} AND PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
